title.rendered: Canadian Chopin Society honors Jan Lisiecki

content.rendered:
The Canadian Chopin Society was proud to honor internationally acclaimed pianist Jan Lisiecki with its first Artist Recognition Award on March 3, 2013. The young Canadian-Polish pianist was recently asked to substitute at short notice for Martha Argerich in a Bologna concert under Claudio Abbado.

We eagerly await the upcoming release of his Deutsche Grammophon recording of the Chopin Etudes Op. 10 and 25, recorded in Toronto’s Koerner Hall.

Click here to to read more about Jan Lisiecki.
